title: Savannah Guthrie’s brother pleads for mother’s kidnapper to contact family
summary_full: In a video posted on social media, he further implored the people holding Nancy Guthrie to send proof they had herTV host Savannah Guthrie’s brother on Thursday renewed the family’s plea for their mother’s kidnapper to contact them, hours after an Arizona sheriff said investigators don’t have proof Nancy Guthrie is alive, but believe “she’s still out there”.“Whoever is out there holding our mother, we want to hear from you. We haven’t heard anything directly,” Camron Guthrie said in a video statement posted on Instagram. Continue reading...
